name: Basic Plan
description: A simple plan for beginners with essential gym access and a few group classes.
features: Access to cardio machines like treadmills and bikes to improve heart health.
Two beginner-level group workout sessions per week including yoga and Zumba.
Shared locker room with secure storage for personal items.
Free Wi-Fi throughout the gym to stream music or track workouts.
Basic customer support during staffed hours to assist with inquiries.

name: Standard Plan
description: Ideal for regular users, offering full gym access and personal training consultations.
features: Access to all gym equipment including weights, cardio machines, and resistance machines.
Unlimited group fitness classes like HIIT, yoga, and cycling.
One complimentary personal training session every month.
Post-workout relaxation with access to the dry sauna.
Quarterly nutrition consultations to help achieve fitness goals.

name: Premium Plan
description: Designed for fitness enthusiasts who want comprehensive gym services, including 24/7 access and customized plans.
features: Gym access at any time, including weekends and holidays.
Personalized training with a dedicated trainer to reach your fitness goals.
Full access to our steam room for detox and muscle recovery.
Exclusive member discount on sports massage therapy.
Track progress through our app with synced fitness devices.
Receive a custom diet plan tailored to your fitness needs.
